price: جا بەرزو بڵندی بۆ خوای پاشای ڕاست و ڕەوا ھیچ پەرستراوێک نیە جگە لە ئەو کە پەروەردگاری عەرشی بەڕێزو بەرزە
arabic: فَتَعَٰلَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمَلِكُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡكَرِيمِ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fataʿālā al-lahu al-maliku al-ḥaqu lā ilāha illā huwa rabbu al-ʿarshi al-karīmi
